website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour HOVR Sonic 3 is packed with advanced technologies helping the user become a better runner. It is designed to provide a light and well-protected ride, making the platform perfect for long-distance runs. This neutral running shoe is suitable for runners who are looking for cushioning, flexibility, and versatility.
pros: A lot of runners appreciated the Under Armour HOVR Sonic 3’s overall quality
This running shoe is comfortable to wear, based on reviews
Several users mentioned that this shoe is highly durable
One commenter noted that it is suitable for both hot and cold conditions
The shoe offers just the right amount of support, some buyers claimed
The shoe’s performance tracking feature was praised by a lot of satisfied wearers
A few purchasers appreciated this shoe’s lightweight structure
This running partner is flexible, according to some reviewers
cons: Some runners felt that the Under Armour HOVR Sonic 3 is a bit tight
One user noted that the sweat stains are visible on the upper
It is a bit expensive compared to other running shoes, according to a buyer
A couple of testers experience tracking issues with the MapMyRun app

customer_reviews.title: Great mid distance runner
customer_reviews.text: Good cushioning. I have used it for 5-10k runs and been comfortable the whole way. Removable interior socklet is good for quick drying, Snug fit all the way along. Good cushioning without being too squishy. It also has bluetooth! Sounds like a gimmic but it gives you 12 months VIP on MapMyRun and some decent insights e.g. I know I need to increace my cadence and the app tracks it and reminds me and it correctly anylises my heel striking tendancy. This bluetooth gimic is not worth buying the trainer for alone but is the icing on the cake of a good set of runnners.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Soft sole wore down far too quickly
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable and I was highly impressed with them to start with, however after just 50km of walking on the treadmill the midsole is very badly worn. I contacted Under Armour and they said that should not wear that quickly, and if I had bought direct from them they would have given me a full refund. I will be filing for an Amazon return on these.
customer_reviews.author: Dolph

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, aestheticly pleasing trainers, but chip didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of trainers, really comfortable and have stopped me getting shin splints when running! The only slight problem I had with them is that the step tracker in them would not work at all! But for me I already have a fitness watch so I wasn't that bothered! If you're buying these shoes because of the step tracking I wouldn't get these because mine didn't work, it wouldn't even sync to my phone. On a comfort level they are excellent, and I love how they look too
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I have ever owned. Love the Bluetooth connection and the coach notes you can get once synced with the free app. Light and extremely comfortable. It is my second pair and I will always buy under armour now.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.text: So. MASSIVE disappointment. Tight fit which constantly irritates me about sports shoe manufacturers. Why so effing tight?! And to cap it all the Bluetooth was dead, I mean completely dead. Which was kind of the point of getting them 🤔 🙄 Now I will have to wait the best part of a month before I get replacements, because the seller can't seem to get their act together 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Erikanissen

customer_reviews.title: good performance , but pricing ?
customer_reviews.text: Yes , they don't make these in America or Switzerland , so pricey . However they are better than many other brands for that price . Cushioning is good enough that I did not have to add a insole . The price should not shoot up to the 90 pound mark though . I paid less before the price was raised .
customer_reviews.author: coached88

customer_reviews.title: No padding around mouth of shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the design around ankle of this show. No padding, no support in this area. I have a pair of UAHOVR infinite trainers and they are by far the best trainers I have ever owned. I therefore returned the Sonic 3 and will purchase another pair or Infinite’s.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie S

customer_reviews.title: A great running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Always with most running shoes go a half size higher. Superb trainer. I did lots of research before buying. Needless to say I'm hitting daily 5 milers and not a single niggle. Tracking chip for the app is spot on too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Yetton

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, particularly give my wide feet. The coaching tips are really great, and have helped me push on with my running. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them :)
customer_reviews.text: Very happy about shoes. Haven't tested them properly but first 3km and no problem with my muscles (like I had before). Biy crazy pairing shoes with mobile phone through Bluetooth (never imagined that one day I will say that) but the amount of information they provide in MapMyRun is amazing. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patryk K.

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes on low cost
customer_reviews.text: My first run with them was 8k. Very happy with them so far..
customer_reviews.author: Emi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these training shoes. They were a little bit firmer than expected but they stabalize the feet and ankles when running. They provide support and a natural bounce which I feel has really helped me with my running.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable on my heels
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the feeling on my heels, very unusual
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Berenson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product, light weight, good support, very breathable. The under armour feature is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding shoe. Great cushioning, very comfortable. My performance has actually improved (new personal bests), a testament to how awesome this product is. The bluetooth info and features are an added bonus. Highly recommended as a low cost alternative to Zoom tech, Boost, Hoka etc.
customer_reviews.author: release the cure

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of trainers I've every had!
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of trainers I've had. They fit well and are very comfortable to run in on both road and off track. Highly recommended 👌
customer_reviews.author: Charlie189

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes. A little smaller on the fit so I took one size up and it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Lyubomir

customer_reviews.title: It's a good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for all day walking. Using it while delivering. Not enough grip on wet surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HOVR Sonic 3 Road Running Shoe
feature_bullets: Ideal Fit - These men's trainers have a microthread upper that dries quickly and gives a breathable, compression-like fit for lightweight strength
HOVR Technology - With UA HOVR technology, these athletic shoes give a zero-gravity feel and eliminate impact while maintaining energy return
Material Composition: Upper: 99% Textile,1% Synthetic~Outsole: 100% Rubber
Ultimate Comfort - These gym runners have a removable, anti-microbial Ortholite sockliner which moulds to the foot for customised comfort and cushion
Digitally Connected - With an embedded Record Sensor, these running shoes track, analyse, and store detailed running metrics to improve performance
Material and Fit - Under Armour UA HOVR Sonic 3 sports shoes for men, Black trainers for running etc, Material: Mesh, Fit: Men's - varying sizes
